Title: ComicsDisplay
Description:
Comics Display is a very simple yet efficient CBR/CBZ viewer. It has been developed as an F# application example for WPF (and for need of the author).

It simply associates the viewer to the extensions and shows you using Fish eye (without anim yet) comics.

Hope you'll enjoy it.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Comics Display is a very simple yet efficient CBR/CBZ viewer. It has been developed as an F# application example for WPF (and for need of the author).

It simply associates the viewer to the extensions and shows you using Fish eye (without anim yet) comics.

Hope you'll enjoy it.

Compilation notes: you'll need DotNetZip and NUnrar libraries for compiling the projects and you can find them in the binaries you can download.

Known issues: without scroll wheel mouse (or emulator) you can't zoom. Not all RAR formats are supported by nunrar library.
